name: COMPRESSION
description: Making a larger file smaller to save space

name: FREQUENCY
description: Number of times per second that a sound wave’s cycle repeats

name: PREAMP
description: Boosts microphone signals to a level we can hear them

name: WAVEFORM
description: Graphical display of a sound pressure wave over time

name: POLAR PATTERN
description: Sensitivity of a microphone to sounds coming from any given angle

name: NYQUIST FREQUENCY
description: Equal to half the sample rate

name: GROUND LIFT
description: Can help to stop hums or buzz in your signal
